subject: Good day,
body:
Good day,
We have concluded to Send your payment through Money Gram money
transfer $6,000.00 daily until the total fund of ($3.7MILLION ) is
completely transferred. Meanwhile, MR. Howard Edward has Send you
$6,000.00 in your name today. So contact Mr. Howard Edward, through
Money Gram money transfer payment Agent to SEND you the MTCN to pick
up this $6000 now:
CONTACT PERSON: Mr. Howard Edward
Cell Phone +229 68564057
Email Address:( 
moneygraminfo0@gmail.com
 )
Please remember to Call and ask him to give you the Reference Number,
sender name, question and answer to pick up the $6000.00. Also you
should send to him your information to cross check it to avoid
mistake.
Receiver's Name________________
Address: ______________________
Country: ______________________
Phone Number: _________________
Your Occupation _______________
I.D Card:______________________
Though, Mr. Howard Edward has sent $6000 in your name today so contact
Mr. Howard Edward or you call him +22968564057 as soon as you receive
this email and tell him to give you the Reference Number, sender name
and question/answer to pick the $6000 Please let us know as soon as
you received all your fund,
Best Regards.
Mrs. Judith Peloquin

subject: Re:   Good day,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you provide more details about how the Money Gram money transfer process works? How long does it usually take for the funds to be available for pickup?

Best wishes,
Inez

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
[image: Western Union Logo Images, Stock Photos & Vectors | Shutterstock]
*Dear: *

We acknowledge the receipt of your email received today.

Instruction was given to us by (IMF) International Monetary Fund to invite
you to sign your claim document, or you send $199  dollars only to get a
lawyer who will sign on your behalf to start receiving your payment. You
can also send the fee via   iTunes gift card or Steam wallet gift card  of
$199 if you cannot drive to  iTunes gift card   Steam wallet gift card  to
send the money.



*We wish to inform you that every other necessary arrangement is done, you
will be receiving a maximum of $6000 Dollars every day by day until the
total fund of ($3,700,000 million USD) gets completed.*



Below is the receiver information to send the signing claiming document
charges of $199 , via  iTunes gift card    Steam wallet gift card *of $199
and forward the copy.*



*We are waiting to hear from today with the fee to enable this department
to release your fund immediately. Looking forward to your anticipated
response.*

*Best regards,*

*Mr.* *Howard Edward*


*+1(646) 543-4952*


*Director MoneyGram International .*

*Call for urgent discussion.*

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about the process of signing the claim document or sending the fee via gift card? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Inez
